element.name: mpegtsmux
element.description: Multiplexes media streams into an MPEG Transport Stream
element.author: Fluendo <contact@fluendo.com>

caps.name: sink_%d
caps.details: video/mpeg, mpegversion=(int){ 1, 2, 4 }, systemstream=(boolean)false; video/x-dirac; video/x-h264, stream-format=(string)byte-stream; audio/mpeg, mpegversion=(int){ 1, 2 }; audio/mpeg, mpegversion=(int)4, stream-format=(string){ raw, adts }; audio/x-lpcm, width=(int){ 16, 20, 24 }, rate=(int){ 48000, 96000 }, channels=(int)[ 1, 8 ], dynamic_range=(int)[ 0, 255 ], emphasis=(boolean){ false, true }, mute=(boolean){ false, true }; audio/x-ac3; audio/x-dts
